div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, June 4, 1922. FOR THE VICTIMS OF THE FISK STREET FIRE

body.p: Our countryman, Mr. Josef Voborny, whose collection for the benefit of the stricken families....we mentioned in our previous issue [Translator's note: See issue of June 1, 1922] distributed the money he thus collected among those families which suffered most because of fire damages. [The money collected totalled $247. This amount was distributed among seven families, the names of which are omitted in translation.]....
